title: Test if an Object has a Property

tests.text: You should choose the correct method for the first assertion - property vs. notProperty.
You should choose the correct method for the second assertion - property vs. notProperty.
You should choose the correct method for the third assertion - property vs. notProperty.

description:
As a reminder, this project is being built upon the following starter project on Gitpod, or cloned from GitHub.

property asserts that the actual object has a given property.
instructions: Within tests/1_unit-tests.js under the test labeled #16 in the Objects suite, change each assert to either assert.property or assert.notProperty to make the test pass (should evaluate to true). Do not alter the arguments passed to the asserts.
